divs: sighting detailsi drive to miami every couple of months. i live in clearwater and i usually drive back at night. i have to drive through the everglades to get over to the other side of florida. if you have never been through there then i will tell you its pitch dark when there���s no other cars around. if i remember correctly i drove down there in the end of december maybe the beginning of jan. i was just driving there and back. i just moved to clearwater from there and was getting the rest of my things. it had to be like 12:30 on a friday or sat night. i remember it was a weekend so at that time there were no other cars driving in the everglades b\c everybody has already made it to their destination for the weekend. so i was driving and it was really foggy but right above not even a hundred feet up is this object with huge big lights. i have never seen lights this big and i have never seen lights that had a glow like this. as i drove under it i was kinda in shock but then i watched it in my rearview mirror it was still sitting in the same spot hovering. it was not moving at all. i don���t know of any aircraft on this planet that sits in one spot like that. now this time i was driving home this past mo nday around 1 am so i guess you could say tuesday. and what do you know i see the same freaking object but this time i really seen it! it was on the other side of the road and it was hovering again. i know i am not crazy and this time i almost had a heart attack! at this point i don���t really care what anyone thinks. what are the chances to see that even once and i seen it twice. im telling you i am so scared to drive through there ever again. i had to drive over 100 mph to get out of there as soon as i could just so i felt safe. i was about 40 mins into the everglades both times. its really scary because your phones don���t work out there and there are never any cops out there its just you and the everglades. but i will tell you its real what i saw. and this time the object was brave it didnt care who seen it. it was hovered over the road and this time there where cars on the road and they all where driving right underneath it. i mean i guess you could just drive under it but im sure if you seen it when your driving that fast you might not pay attention. but i know someone else had to of seen this if i seen it twice. i have never seen anything else like it ever. have you had anyone else say anything about the everglades? please let me know if you have becasue my sister and my boyfriend think i am very crazy or that i am making it up or that it was a plane or a chopper but it wasnt in any way. im glad i seen your documentary on tv becasue you really dont know what to do when you see something like that.
